review: Dr. Shashikala was very kind and courteous to listen to what we had to say and guided me through the next steps gently. Visits to the doctors can become transactional because we may be the 100th patient to the doctor, but to us it is everything. Dr. Shashikala treated me as a individual and not as another patient.

My wife had met the doctor and it was for pregnancy related. Consultation was fine by the doctor. I can surely recommend doctor to my family or friends circle. She is satisfied with the explanation and treatment given. There was not much waiting time in the hospital. We are consulting since last 3 years. Tests was done. Doctor was friendly.

We visited Dr. Shashikala as soon as we were expecting. The doctor was very patient in listening to us and very enthusiastically gave all the answers and information that we wanted. She keeps in mind the need of the patient and their medical history *** ** ** ********* ************* ******* *** **** ** *** *** *********** ***** ** ******** *** ** ***** ***** ******** **** ************** *** *** ***************** * ****** ****** **** ********* ********* *** such a patient demeanour, you would definitely be in good hands. I would definitely refer her to my friends and others.

Straight suggested ivf. Please don't go to this hospital. 
She suggested test for both of us without going step by step. Instead all tests at once.
Patient and courteous doctor. Answered all the queries n questions diligently n patiently. Even addressed concerns on phone at a later stage in 1st trimester

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: She was very explantive to my wife . And she has given many health tips to strengthen her negatives .

review: Her advise on the predelivery and post delivery was very helpful. She discussed minute issues and explained pros and cons of the symptoms.
She was very calm and listening to our concerns. Advised based on the need of the time..............
